group_1.textCenter: I'm honestly surprised by how intensely their@vitriol has escalated,
now that their hatred for the Magical Girl@population has been directed towards us...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe I'm the least worse off, merely being used...

group_1.textRight: Sasha, I would hardly say you're better off than@we are, considering they're using
your situation with the advisor as leverage@and imposing unreasonable demands on you.

group_1.textLeft: Then what about you, Asahi?@You bear fresh wounds every day...
Yes, while we can erase physical pain and@alleviate physical wounds,
emotional scars are bound to accumulate,@rather than heal...

group_1.textRight: If that's what satisfies them, then so be it.
We'll wait until things cool down...

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't sound like things are going to be@resolved very quickly...

group_1.textRight: Indeed...
But, however he may seem right now,@Kuroda is a kind man at heart.
Through meaningful conversation, if he can gain@insight into our perspective,
he'll reflect on his actions and, consequently,@become more empathetic.

group_1.textLeft: Can you still find it in your heart to forgive him@despite everything, Asahi?

group_1.textRight: It's because I broke his heart...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm truly sorry.
Spreading the word about Magical Girls,@shouldering all the resentment for ourselves,
those were my decisions.
Asahi, Sasha, I've dragged you both into this,@ruining even your friendships...

group_1.textRight: That's not true, Rabi-chan.
It's my fault for agreeing too readily.
Besides, there's nothing wrong with what you@suggested, Rabi.

group_1.textLeft: Right?
Because your genuine desire for sympathy@resonated with me,
I empathized with you, Rabi-chan.

group_1.textRight: Since the moment we sought salvation together,@we've been in this side by side.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: Well then, let's do our best together tomorrow! â™ª
I've already steeled myself for enduring the scars@of each passing day.

group_1.textLeft: I, too, will not be a coward. I shall endure this.
Well then, until next time...

group_1.textCenter: (Even when I try to be strong, tears just@naturally well up...)
(Perhaps it would be better to simply destroy@my own Soul Gem and perish.)
(The hatred amassed by the Eradication Faction@might dissipate...)
If that's the case, then Asahi...and Sasha...

group_1.textRight: [chara:103301:effect_shake]What are you doing...?!

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*!

group_1.textRight: If you have a Grief Seed, hurry up and purify that!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness... I made it in time...
You've seemed depressed for a while now.@I've been worried about you...

group_1.textLeft: Why...

group_1.textRight: I just happened to come outside for a drink.

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean, how do you know about Magical Girls...?

group_1.textRight: My daughter fights as a Magical Girl,@just like all of you do.
I've rented this place for such a long stay because@I'm working on a book about Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: ...An adult who acknowledges the existence of@Magical Girls... I've never met such a person before.

group_1.textRight: Not only acknowledgment, I've also been conducting@research for my daughter's sake for a long time.
Researching how to avoid becoming a Witch, as well@as how to make people aware of your existence.

group_1.textLeft: How much do you know about us...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know that much about you guys, Rabi.
However, I have an acquaintance who is an@associate professor at a nearby university.
She told me there's a rumor about Magical Girls@going around among the students.
That's how I found out about Nightlife Homeroom,@allegedly where the rumor originated.
I heard your statement while watching the show.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: The story of Magical Girls doesn't spread unless@it's done so intentionally.
Summarily, in an effort to make everyone aware@of the existence of Magical Girls,
you have been sorely misunderstood and@perceived as villains.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's why we went on air, to take the blame@upon ourselves.
Despite seeking sympathy, it was my mistake@which brought about this situation...

group_1.textRight: Ah, so that's what caused the accumulation@of your impurities...

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you understand, and I appreciate the help.
But please don't involve yourself with us.

group_1.textRight: ...No, Rabi, I'd rather you let me help you.

group_1.textLeft: Why...!

group_1.textRight: As my daughter is also a Magical Girl, I can't@simply ignore this situation.

group_1.textLeft: But I've already brought misery to my comrades@because of my wrong decisions...
So...

group_1.textRight: That's why you're turning to me, a third party.
It's too painful to bear the resentment of the@entire Magical Girl community all on your own...
Rabi...!

group_1.textLeft: Together...let's help Asahi...
If I'm already struggling like this...@She's the one in the greatest danger...
